title: Availability Calendar
disable_dates_explanation: To make your home unavailable for a date or range of dates, either click on individual days, or click and drag to disable a date range.
cannot_make_this_period_unavailable: Unfortunately you cannot make {{roomName}} unavailable for this time period because it has a pending or approved booking.
please_go_to_reservations: Please go to {{- openLink}}your reservations{{- closeLink}} to manage pending and pre-existing bookings.
pausing_explanation: Unlist your home to temporarily hide/remove it from search results.
